title: Crash
body: My game is litteraly crashing every minute. I can not play the game when its fking kicking me out every seconds. Theres no point of winning lane, I'll just lag out and die in my lane every minute. I dont think I will play league if this happens more. Im done with this.

replies.body: That sounds like a really crappy situation, and I'd like to help!  I do need just a bit more info, though.  When you say crash, what's happening exactly?  What are you seeing, and are there any error messages?  I want to help pinpoint the cause so we can get to work!  Let me know.
